mapper.sql: ID, APPLICATIONNO, WORKSHEETNO, RETURNTYPE, APREMARK, APLOSS, ENTRYTIME, RECEIVEGUNIT, INVALIDATESIGN, RETURNUNIT, RECORDINGTIME, ENTRYUNIT, PERSONNAME, CONFIRMATIONTIME, CONFIRMATIONUNIT, CONFIRMATIONPERSONNAME, TREATMENTSTATE, APRETURNSTATUS, IDENTIFICATIONSIGN, HANDLINGOPINIONS, DENIALTYPE
mapper.insert: insert into BOS.RET_RETURNLIST (ID, APPLICATIONNO, WORKSHEETNO, RETURNTYPE, APREMARK, APLOSS, ENTRYTIME, RECEIVEGUNIT, INVALIDATESIGN, RETURNUNIT, RECORDINGTIME, ENTRYUNIT, PERSONNAME, CONFIRMATIONTIME, CONFIRMATIONUNIT, CONFIRMATIONPERSONNAME, TREATMENTSTATE, APRETURNSTATUS, IDENTIFICATIONSIGN, HANDLINGOPINIONS, DENIALTYPE) values (RQT_RETURNID.Nextval,concat('SQ',RQT_RETURNID.Nextval),concat('GDH',RQT_RETURNID.Nextval), #{returntype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{apremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aploss,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{entrytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{receivegunit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{invalidatesign,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{returnunit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recordingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{entryunit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{personname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confirmationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{confirmationunit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{confirmationpersonname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{treatmentstate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RQT_RETURNID.Nextval, #{identificationsign,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{handlingopinions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{denialtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into BOS.RET_RETURNLIST
ID,
APPLICATIONNO,
WORKSHEETNO,

mapper.update:
update BOS.RET_RETURNLIST
APPLICATIONNO = #{applicationno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORKSHEETNO = #{worksheetno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RETURNTYPE = #{returntype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
APREMARK = #{apremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APLOSS = #{aploss,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ENTRYTIME = #{entrytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RECEIVEGUNIT = #{receivegunit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INVALIDATESIGN = #{invalidatesign,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RETURNUNIT = #{returnunit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECORDINGTIME = #{recordingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ENTRYUNIT = #{entryunit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PERSONNAME = #{personname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONFIRMATIONTIME = #{confirmationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CONFIRMATIONUNIT = #{confirmationunit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONFIRMATIONPERSONNAME = #{confirmationpersonname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TREATMENTSTATE = #{treatmentstate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
APRETURNSTATUS = #{apreturnstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IDENTIFICATIONSIGN = #{identificationsign,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HANDLINGOPINIONS = #{handlingopinions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DENIALTYPE = #{denialtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update BOS.RET_RETURNLIST set APPLICATIONNO = #{applicationno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORKSHEETNO = #{worksheetno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RETURNTYPE = #{returntype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, APREMARK = #{apremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APLOSS = #{aploss,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ENTRYTIME = #{entrytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RECEIVEGUNIT = #{receivegunit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INVALIDATESIGN = #{invalidatesign,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RETURNUNIT = #{returnunit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RECORDINGTIME = #{recordingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ENTRYUNIT = #{entryunit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PERSONNAME = #{personname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONFIRMATIONTIME = #{confirmationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CONFIRMATIONUNIT = #{confirmationunit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONFIRMATIONPERSONNAME = #{confirmationpersonname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TREATMENTSTATE = #{treatmentstate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, APRETURNSTATUS = #{apreturnstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IDENTIFICATIONSIGN = #{identificationsign,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HANDLINGOPINIONS = #{handlingopinions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DENIALTYPE = #{denialtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
